ai-tha-ap139:0.3_0: he gave the gift of the Fortunate One’s discrimination,
ai-tha-ap139:1.1_0: “Seeing the musicians, sinking in very poison,
ai-tha-ap139:1.2_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap139:1.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap139:2.1_0: and a hundred thousand proficient in the three Vedas.
ai-tha-ap139:2.4_0: who doesn’t be inspired by him,
ai-tha-ap139:3.2_0: is not found in the world with its gods.
ai-tha-ap139:3.3_0: Awakened as one who has knowledge,
ai-tha-ap139:3.4_0: who doesn’t be inspired by him,
ai-tha-ap139:4.1_0: teaching the Dhamma as far as it means
ai-tha-ap139:4.3_0: were not able to endure the transfer.
ai-tha-ap139:4.4_0: who doesn’t be inspired by him,
ai-tha-ap139:6.2_0: would wander through the Buddha’s teaching,
ai-tha-ap139:6.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap139:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ānanda.
ai-tha-ap139:10.1_0: for the (who returns) seven Elder Ānanda’s duties.
